WRITING.TITLE: Set of double exposure 'mindfulness' illustrations I created for a magazine article

WRITING.TEXT: Ohwow, that's pretty amazing, I never knew mirrors were green. Thank you so much for the detailed answer, I will die a happy human now. Thanks! :)

WRITING.TITLE: If a lightbulb is turned on in a 4 walled room made of mirrors, is the room 4 times as bright?
WRITING.TEXT: As in, if the 4 walls are made of mirrors. Or is it infinitely brighter because the mirrors are reflecting each other endlessly with the lightbulb in it?! Oh my brain hurts.
